dublin_core.dcvalue: Any use and integration of new technology into nursing should be accomplished in a purposeful and meaningful manner The synopsis reported here provides the health care arena with nurses response to devices and technologies their emerging roles in the health care system as a result of telehealth technology and the impact of new technology on patients and health care enterprises
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:54:54Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2002-04-17
Caring : National Association for Home Care magazine
Telehealth practice in home care. Synopsis of the 2000 US Telenursing role study.
